info.title: AzureArcDataManagementClient
info.description: The AzureArcData management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs to manage Azure Data Services on Azure Arc Resources.

Operation.description: Azure Data Services on Azure Arc operation definition.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object.

display.description: The localized display information for this particular operation / action.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Azure Data Services on Azure Arc operations.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name.

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation.

operation.description: The localized friendly name for the operation.

description.description: The localized friendly description for the operation.

apiVersion.name: api-version
apiVersion.description: The API version to use for the request
